title: When you are stunned by a 2.5 second Ashe ult. . . .
body:
And the enemy proceeds to only auto attack you.
http://a.fod4.com/misc/Punch%20Chuck%20Norris.gif

It's actually up to 3.5 seconds...
One for All Ashe would be scary. 17.5 seconds of continous stuns if done properly
I once killed the enemy top laner on over half health with an Ashe ult. He probably shouldn't have walked under the turret, but whatever.
when stunned by an ashe ult then a morgana ult then a morgana q as the cherry on top is just pricless mattr of fact. i wonder how long you could chain cc someone.
Add in a top lane leona and you could have someone cc'd for atleast 6 seconds I think. Plenty of time to simply auto attack them to death and save on mana.
Get Mid Lane Lux and that's 8 seconds.

And a jungle veigar for his stun?
https://media.giphy.com/media/xHX546S4pQBPy/giphy.gif

Her name is Mirana. She is like Nidalee if Nid's spear had 3 times the range and stunned you for 5 seconds at max range.
Welcome to Dota.
does this look like fookin dota?

Yes, yes it does.
With better graphics.
Yeah, it actually kind of does.

The arrow travels so fucking slowly it's laughable though

Naw, you go mid veigar and jungle Nautilus.

Alternatively, mid Veigar and jungle Lux might work better. Neither are really good junglers, but Lux actually has more doable clears if you don't mind having ridiculously slow clears.

> [{quoted}](name=Embertine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bAMAtk98,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-02T20:10:16.162+0000)

> And a jungle veigar for his stun?
> https://media.giphy.com/media/xHX546S4pQBPy/giphy.gif

no, jungle sion for even more.
Jungle Nautilus can hard cc someone for about 4.5 seconds by himself.  Might want to go with that instead.

> [{quoted}](name=Embertine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bAMAtk98,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-02T20:10:16.162+0000)

> https://media.giphy.com/media/xHX546S4pQBPy/giphy.gif

I'm pretty sure it's permanent; some champions could chain CC permanently by themselves in URF mode, so it really only takes like 2 or 3 to chain CC someone.

Leona can stun 1.25 seconds every 7.5 seconds. She can reduce the cooldown to 4.5 seconds with 40% CDR.

Annie can stun 7.75 times over the course of 80 seconds, for 1.75 seconds each. She can reduce this to 7.75 times every 48 seconds, or about once every 6 seconds. Her stuns, however, are not evenly spread out.

Sion can stun once every 6 seconds, for 2.25 seconds, but has to wait for a 2 second windup to get his full stun. He can reduce the CD to 3.6 seconds, for a net total of 5.6 seconds.

Twisted Fate can stun once every 6 seconds, for 2 seconds, but has to wait for his card to hit the right option and fire before he starts his CD. He can reduce the CD to 3.6 seconds.

Similarly, Brand can stun once every 6 seconds, for 2 seconds, and can reduce the CD to 3.6 seconds. However, he doesn't need to wait to use his stun.

Between TF and Brand, I think you could probably keep someone down permanently, given enough mana regen and perfect play(instant chain gold cards). With any of the others, you could definitely hold someone down permanently.

If you're counting roots, Morgana roots for 3 seconds with 11 second CD, reduced 6.6. 
Karma (w/ult) roots for 3.25 seconds every 12 seconds, reduced 7.2. With passive, she can have her ult up every 6.6 seconds(2 autos + Q)

> i wonder how long you could chain cc someone.

{{champion:111}} I've been glued to the floor before on Nautilus. I was playing Kog'Maw but I still feel that his CC is through the roof. {{summoner:3}}
that's a Chuck Norris punch im not gonna last long man..
you wanna know why it was 2.5 secs? i ulted down mid lane because i don't need it bot. GETREKTNERD
Dude, I've ulted a Zed in top lane from bot lane and gave the top laner a kill. GET ON MY LEVEL.
